name: Rewind Race
description:
Controls: 'Space' to Jump, 'R' to Restart --- (PLEASE PLAY IN FULLSCREEN)

This is my entry for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020! This is the first game jam that I have ever taken part of, so I hope I have done all of this correctly. Either way, I had a blast putting my skills to the test! I hope you enjoy my game!

The theme is Rewind, thus, I present to you my game, Rewind Race! It is a game in which you must complete the level before time has run out, but after completing the level, you must race a "rewind" version of your completion, AND WIN! It will take a bit of brain power to find the best path for your success, there and back.
If you get stuck, try different paths or try collecting different items on your route. 

I will be making a video on Rewind Race's development process here in the next week. Be sure to check out my YouTube Channel to see it when it goes live!
